member.name: T:BitMono.Core.Analyzing.ArgumentTracer
member.summary: Provides argument tracing capabilities for method calls using Echo's data flow graph. This service traces arguments from call instructions backward through the data flow, handling variables, constants, branches, and control flow complexity.

member.name: M:BitMono.Core.Analyzing.ArgumentTracer.TraceArguments(AsmResolver.DotNet.Code.Cil.CilMethodBody,AsmResolver.PE.DotNet.Cil.CilInstruction)
member.summary: Traces the arguments of a call instruction using Echo's data flow graph.
member.param: The method body containing the call instruction.
The call instruction to trace arguments for.
member.returns: Array of instruction indices that produce the arguments, or null if tracing fails.

member.name: M:BitMono.Core.Analyzing.ArgumentTracer.TraceArgumentsRobust(AsmResolver.DotNet.Code.Cil.CilMethodBody,AsmResolver.PE.DotNet.Cil.CilInstruction,System.Int32)
member.summary: Traces arguments using stack simulation algorithm.

member.name: M:BitMono.Core.Analyzing.ArgumentTracer.GetStackDepthAtInstruction(AsmResolver.DotNet.Code.Cil.CilMethodBody,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates the stack depth at a specific instruction.

member.name: M:BitMono.Core.Analyzing.ArgumentTracer.GetStackPushCount(AsmResolver.PE.DotNet.Cil.CilInstruction)
member.summary: Gets the number of values pushed onto the stack by an instruction.

member.name: M:BitMono.Core.Analyzing.ArgumentTracer.GetStackPopCount(AsmResolver.PE.DotNet.Cil.CilInstruction)
member.summary: Gets the number of values popped from the stack by an instruction.

member.name: M:BitMono.Core.Analyzing.ArgumentTracer.GetVarPushCount(AsmResolver.PE.DotNet.Cil.CilInstruction)
member.summary: Gets the variable push count for variable-push instructions.

member.name: M:BitMono.Core.Analyzing.ArgumentTracer.GetVarPopCount(AsmResolver.PE.DotNet.Cil.CilInstruction)
member.summary: Gets the variable pop count for variable-pop instructions.

member.name: M:BitMono.Core.Analyzing.ArgumentTracer.TraceArgumentsFromBegin(AsmResolver.DotNet.Code.Cil.CilMethodBody,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Traces arguments from the begin instruction to the call instruction.

member.name: M:BitMono.Core.Analyzing.ArgumentTracer.IsSystemVoid(AsmResolver.DotNet.ITypeDescriptor)
member.summary: Checks if a type is System.Void.

member.name: M:BitMono.Core.Analyzing.ArgumentTracer.TraceStringArgument(AsmResolver.DotNet.Code.Cil.CilMethodBody,AsmResolver.PE.DotNet.Cil.CilInstruction,System.Int32)
member.summary: Traces a string argument from a call instruction.
member.param: The method body containing the call instruction.
The index of the string argument to trace (0-based).
member.returns: The string value if found, null otherwise.

member.name: M:BitMono.Core.Analyzing.ArgumentTracer.TraceTypeArgument(AsmResolver.DotNet.Code.Cil.CilMethodBody,AsmResolver.PE.DotNet.Cil.CilInstruction,System.Int32)
member.summary: Traces a type argument from a call instruction.
member.param: The method body containing the call instruction.
The index of the type argument to trace (0-based).
member.returns: The type definition if found, null otherwise.

member.name: M:BitMono.Core.Analyzing.ArgumentTracer.ExtractStringFromMethodCall(AsmResolver.DotNet.Code.Cil.CilMethodBody,AsmResolver.PE.DotNet.Cil.CilInstruction)
member.summary: Extracts string from a method call instruction.

member.name: M:BitMono.Core.Analyzing.CriticalBaseTypesCriticalAnalyzer.YieldAncestors(AsmResolver.DotNet.TypeDefinition)
member.summary: Yields the full class names of all ancestors across the inheritence chain of , including itself.

member.name: M:BitMono.Core.Analyzing.ReflectionCriticalAnalyzer.HandleMemberOverrideReferences(AsmResolver.DotNet.IMemberDefinition)
member.summary: Handles member override references to prevent base members from being obfuscated.
member.param: The member that was found through reflection.

member.name: M:BitMono.Core.Analyzing.ReflectionCriticalAnalyzer.GetBaseMembers(AsmResolver.DotNet.IMemberDefinition)
member.summary: Gets the base members that the given member overrides.
member.param: The member to find base overrides for.
member.returns: Collection of base members that are overridden.

member.name: M:BitMono.Core.Analyzing.ReflectionCriticalAnalyzer.IsMethodOverride(AsmResolver.DotNet.MethodDefinition,AsmResolver.DotNet.MethodDefinition)
member.summary: Determines if a method overrides a base method.
member.returns: True if the derived method overrides the base method.

member.name: T:BitMono.Core.Attributes.ConfigureForNativeCodeAttribute
member.summary: This is necessary to make native code work inside the assembly. See more here: https://docs.washi.dev/asmresolver/guides/dotnet/unmanaged-method-bodies.html However, sometimes it causes issues with the assembly like , that's why you need to manually mark your with .

member.name: T:BitMono.Core.Attributes.DoNotResolveAttribute
member.summary: Represents a sort logic which doesn't include specified in .

member.name: T:BitMono.Core.Attributes.MemberInclusionFlags
member.summary: Flags that specify which types of members should be excluded from resolution (obfuscation). Used with the to control which members are protected from obfuscation.

member.name: F:BitMono.Core.Attributes.MemberInclusionFlags.SpecialRuntime
member.summary: Exclude special runtime members from obfuscation (e.g., special methods, properties, or fields used by the runtime).

member.name: F:BitMono.Core.Attributes.MemberInclusionFlags.Model
member.summary: Exclude model members from obfuscation (e.g., data models, DTOs, or entities that should preserve their structure).

member.name: F:BitMono.Core.Attributes.MemberInclusionFlags.Reflection
member.summary: Exclude members that are used in reflection from obfuscation (e.g., methods, fields, properties accessed via reflection).

member.name: T:BitMono.Core.Attributes.RuntimeMonikerAttribute
member.summary: Represents a mechanism that specifies the runtime moniker of the protection. i.e. if you see this attribute on protection, then only specified attributes are the supported runtime monikers for the protection. If you don't see any of the attributes, then it works everywhere, also, users will get a message via

member.name: P:BitMono.Core.Attributes.RuntimeMonikerAttribute.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the runtime moniker.

member.name: T:BitMono.Core.Attributes.RuntimeMonikerMonoAttribute
member.summary: Represents a mechanism that specifies the runtime moniker of the protection as a Mono. i.e if you see this attribute on protection then only specified attributes are the supported runtime monikers for the protection. If you don't see any of the attributes then it works everywhere, also, users will get a message via
